channel.title: P4g on Yaya's World
channel.description: Recent content in P4g on Yaya's World

item.title: Walkthrough
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: This will walk you through everything you need to do in Persona 4 Golden!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Social Links (er...I mean Social Networking)
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Working on my Persona guides, especially the Persona 4 Golden Social Link guides and working on my own professional development at the same time has got me thinking a little bit about the subject of building Social Networks. I'm not talking about Facebook, or Twitter, or even Mastodon, I'm talking about the relationships we build with each other over time much like the protagonists in a Persona game.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: On Localizations
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: I have 10 max S-Links in Persona 4 Golden \ ( ^ o ^ ) / Just had to say it, lol. That should give you an indication that I have started playing it again. which I have. I'm mostly just working on my S-Links and trying to get through some of the extra post-game content while I wait for things to pick up again. You would think I'd be used to this kind of thing knowing that I also like visual novels, but, for some reason this sort of thing is just not so fun in Persona. Its a big part of it and part of the appeal for some, I suppose, but, in this quantity not so fun. Actually Persona got me thinking about something else lately. So I guess it's time for another Yaya rant ðŸ˜… Feel free to skip the first heading if you just want the site updates. Though I promise this rant will be less angry.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Persona 4 Golden is Over... Maybe?
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: It seems I have completed the last main dungeon for Persona 4 Golden. I'm planning on bringing my walkthrough up to that point today or tomorrow. Now, there is still the matter of, what I believe is, the Golden content. This is the part about finding Marie that, if memory serves (as I don't think she was even in the original) was added for the Golden re-release. So I still have content to work through, but its almost there. Also, I would like to point out that I have a reference generated for a new personal project and I plan on starting that tonight or tomorrow.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: First Article of 2024
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Welcome to 2024! Let's kick off the old and ring in the new! In this first week of 2024 I have made more progress on the Persona 4 Golden walkthrough. I think I am finally nearing the end of the game! Once the walkthrough is up to the last dungeon and boss it won't quite be done, I will be cutting some things out and streamlining it (maybe it'll fit on one page again) so it only helps you get through the game and doesn't have other information. Things like when Marie will be available and other commentary will be moved to other sections, like Social Links or Quests. As for other news, I have finished a game! Look forward to a new review and many more in 2024!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Last Article of 2023 ðŸŽŠ
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: This is the first time I'm late since starting my weekly updates. It has been a crazy day! Fortunately, I'm not too late, but I had a lot of work to do and a lot of other plans. Also I may have spent too long trying to get notes off my Steam Deck so I could update the Persona 4 Golden walkthrough and not enough time actually updating the website ðŸ˜…
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Quests
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: This guides will help you with unlocks, skill boosts, and other quests you encounter throughout the story of the game. All of these are outside of dungeons
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Persona 4 Golden
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Guides for social links, and dungeons as well as general walkthroughs for the remake version of Persona 4 (Persona 4: Golden). Some information in these guides may be applicable to the original PS2 version, but this is not guaranteed
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi
